ixa.kaflib

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • ixa.kaflib.Entity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Relational, Serializable

    public class Entity
extends Object
implements Relational, Serializable
    An entity is a term (or a multiword) that clearly identifies one item. The optional Entity layer is used to reference terms that are entities.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
